resources.string: Your bus is coming in a few minutes
Other artworks are created by me and I shall retain all rights to these creations. If you wish to use these icons, please email mauriceprograms@gmail.com to seek written permission.
Some menu icons and status bar notification icons are from Android OS.

Transit is created by Maurice Lam. The app is aimed to provide convenience to all of us who live, study or work in Champaign-Urbana. This is not an official app from CUMTD. The bus times are provided by the StopWatch system from CUMTD, and this app only serves as a portal to let you view the information and provide additional features. The alarm sound is created by Benboncan of the freesound project. Places search is powered by Google Local Search. Some menu icons and status bar notification icons are from Android OS. The other artwork are created by me and I shall retain all rights to these icons. If you wish to use these icons, please email lam25@illinois.edu to seek written permission.
Transit is created by Maurice Lam.
The app is aimed to provide convenience to all of us who live, study or work in Champaign-Urbana.
The bus arrival times are provided by the STOPwatch system from CUMTD, and this app only serves as a portal to let you view the information and provide additional features.
The alarm sound is created by Benboncan of The Freesound Project.
Places search is powered by Google Local Search.
Please refine your search and try again
Real time bus info for CUMTD
